description: The coach asks for a side‑by‑side visual comparison of the current defensive line depth versus a proposed deeper low‑block setup. PlayMinder Coach ingests the latest match video, pulls defender stats, analyses defensive patterns, generates tactical recommendations for a lower line, creates a PNG diagram showing both current and proposed line depths, and returns the visual to the user.
